course_title: Spec Topics: History: Model Minority in History
class_notes: The model minority myth is one of the most persistent themes in Asian American life. This seminar explores the origins and variations of this myth, as well as various efforts by Asian Americans to challenge this myth throughout history. Special attention will be given to Asian American engagement in domestic and international politics, from the late 19th century to the present.
course_description: An introductory course on a selected topic in history. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
